doc:
Lorenzo Tucker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lorenzo_Tucker 0 Lorenzo Tucker (June 27, 1907 – August 19, 1986), known as the "Black Valentino," was an African-American stage and screen actor who played the romantic lead in the early black films of Oscar Micheaux. Lorenzo_Tucker ( June_27_,_1907 – August_19_,_1986 ) , known as the_"_Black_Valentino , " was an_African-American_stage_and_screen_actor who played the_romantic_lead in the_early_black_films of Oscar_Micheaux .
